title.rendered: Hibiki 17yo Musashino Fuji 2013 Limited Edition Japanese Blended Whisky 43% 700ml.

excerpt.rendered:
Special edition to celebrate the registration of Mount Fuji as a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage in 2013
Limited 7500 btls (Collector Item)
